verbose_text: Synthesis of the target compounds entailed the preparation of phosphorylated ' stretched serine ' derivatives (Scheme 1) suitable for Fmoc solid-phase peptide synthesis and peptide assembly followed by reaction of the phosphorylated peptides with activated nucleoside monophosphate (Scheme 2).
evidence: phosphorylated 'stretched serine' derivatives (Scheme 1) suitable for Fmoc solid-phase peptide synthesis and peptide assembly followed by reaction of the phosphorylated peptides with activated nucleoside monophosphate
